forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 48. East southeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
In the quiet hours of the night, Downtown San Francisco offers a peaceful serenity, with the remnants of the day’s warmth hanging in the still air. The temperature descends gently, wrapping the city in a cool embrace as it approaches the low forties. As dawn breaks, the forecast reveals a promise: a sunlit Wednesday, where the skies will stretch clear and a gentle breeze will greet the day. With highs reaching toward the mid-sixties, the chill of morning will yield to an inviting warmth by afternoon, as the golden sun casts a radiant glow over the iconic cityscape. 

As you step outdoors, the absence of fog brings clarity to the horizon, unveiling the beauty of familiar landmarks. A light jacket should accompany your attire, allowing for comfort during the cooler moments, while sleeves can be rolled up as the day warms. It’s the kind of day that beckons you to explore—perhaps a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or through one of the charming parks dotting the landscape. Indoors, cozy cafes await, inviting you to sip on a warm drink while watching the world gently unfold. With such delightful conditions, today is a perfect canvas for the ordinary pleasures that life in San Francisco offers.
